forbidden.name: no-circular
forbidden.comment: Circular dependencies are harmful and make reasoning about the codebase difficult

forbidden.name: no-orphans
forbidden.comment: Files that don't belong to a module should be refactored into proper modules

forbidden.name: no-module-cross-boundaries
forbidden.comment: Module boundaries should be respected - import from module's public API only

forbidden.name: no-common-utils-cross-boundaries
forbidden.comment: Common utilities should be imported through their public API, not directly

forbidden.name: no-unneeded-imports-from-parent-package
forbidden.comment: Don't import from parent package, import from files directly

forbidden.name: no-unneeded-common-imports
forbidden.comment: Don't import from common, import from specific common module
